competencies.title: Web Performance & Optimization
competencies.desc: Full-stack speed: edge caching with Cloudflare, server tuning (Apache/PHP-FPM), WordPress performance with LiteSpeed Cache / WP Rocket, DB optimizations and refactors for strong Core Web Vitals.

competencies.title: Security & Infrastructure Hardening
competencies.desc: WAF, Bot Management, rate-limits in Cloudflare; security headers, DNSSEC, API key hygiene to mitigate attack vectors.

competencies.title: Analytics & Conversion Tracking
competencies.desc: Robust data layers with GTM + GA4, custom scripts to capture forms and purchases for accurate attribution.

competencies.title: Server Administration & DevOps
competencies.desc: Resource monitoring (htop/Netdata), PHP upgrades, error debugging, and configuration for stability & scale.

projects.title: Graston Instructor Dashboard
projects.description: A React + Mapbox-powered internal tool that gives real-time class and roster visibility.
